name: Time Rescue
description:
A submission to Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

So our idea is that our hero must save his popular friend  against Murder Syndicate and to do that he construct a machine that will rewind to past and protect his friend.

Im highly motivated to create this game.

You can also join to us in Discord https://discord.gg/czvS5X

Controls:

 -   A & D to move left and right

 -   Now we dont have ability to jump becouse it was broken and

I didn't have time to fix it :( 

(when you pressed D and then Space, you cant jump )

 -   Shift to run

 -   LMB (left mouse button) to shoot

Credits: 

art by RedOrange. https://redorange.itch.io/

everything else is made by me.
